sentences.english: All of this is done under the aegis of the creator God of this universe.
sentences.chinese: 那统统皆正在阿谁宇宙的制物神的保护下完秤弈。

sentences.english: It's difficult not to get bogged down because everything tells me Christmas is coming.
sentences.chinese: 不受影响还真不易，由于统统都报告我圣诞节到临了。

sentences.english: They burned up all the garden rubbish yesterday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 昨天下午他们将花园里的垃圾统统烧掉了。

sentences.english: Things will not get back to normal soon after the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 地动当时统统都不会立刻规复正常。

sentences.english: It will be two weeks before everything returns to normal.
sentences.chinese: 两周之后统统才华规复正常。

sentences.english: We will have to reconsider the whole thing.
sentences.chinese: 那统统我们将没有能没有重新甲笤思索。

sentences.english: Before going abroad, he realized all his property.
sentences.chinese: 在出国之前，他把他所有的财产统统变卖了。

sentences.english: All reactionaries are paper tigers. In appearance, the reactionaries are terrifying, but in reality they are not sopowerful.
sentences.chinese: 一切所有号称强大的反动派统统不过是纸老虎。

sentences.english: But by now -the whole party was moving off at a brisk canter.
sentences.chinese: 但现在这一群绅士以轻快的慢跑统统行动起来了。

sentences.english: He knows how to use a11 the switches.
sentences.chinese: 他知道怎样利用统统开关。

sentences.english: But I will toss my head and refuse them all .
sentences.chinese: 我将把头一仰，统统拒绝他们。

sentences.english: Love all children as your own children.
sentences.chinese: 爱统统的孩子，与您自祭阅孩鬃蠡样。

sentences.english: Delete chaine-mails and junk email. Do not forward or reply to any of them.
sentences.chinese: 把连锁信和垃圾邮件统统删除，不要转发或者回复。

sentences.english: The charm of Kellynch and of "Lady Elliot" all faded away.
sentences.chinese: 凯林奇和“埃利奥特夫人”的魅力统统消失了。

sentences.english: How can we get rid of all these flies in the kitchen?
sentences.chinese: 我们怎样才能把厨房里地这些苍蝇统统灭掉呢？

sentences.english: And if you have a river, you share it with everyone.
sentences.chinese: 而假定您有一条河，您便应与统统人分享。

definition: all of it/lock, stock and barrel
(reduplicated) whether... or.../never mind/fine (indicating acceptance or resignation)
all/both/entirely/(used for emphasis) even/already/(not) at all
only/just (i.e. it is only that...)/all except/unique
as before/(same) as usual/in the same manner/still/nevertheless
to throw out/to get rid of
